data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Throw-in Strasbourg.
In the minute 2, Can Marseille get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Strasbourg's half?
Ball safe as Marseille is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Marseille to take a throw-in in Strasbourg territory.
In the minute 5, Free kick for Strasbourg in their own half.
Strasbourg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Strasbourg in the half of Marseille.
In the minute 7, Johann Hamel signals a free kick to Marseille in their own half.
Goal kick for Strasbourg at Stade de la Meinau.
Marseille awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 8, Johann Hamel signals a free kick to Strasbourg in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Strasbourg push forward at Stade de la Meinau and Adrien Thomasson gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Marseille defence.
In the minute 12, Johann Hamel signals a Strasbourg throw-in in Marseille's half.
Throw-in for Marseille in the half of Strasbourg.
Free kick Strasbourg.
In the minute 18, Johann Hamel awards the home team a throw-in.
Strasbourg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Strasbourg have been awarded a corner by Johann Hamel.
In the minute 20, Strasbourg are coming forward and Adrien Thomasson gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Strasbourg.
Free kick for Strasbourg in their own half.
In the minute 22, Ball goes out of play for a Marseille goal kick.
Corner awarded to Strasbourg.
Strasbourg to take a throw-in in Marseille territory.
In the minute 28, Throw-in for Strasbourg in their own half.
Johann Hamel signals a free kick to Marseille in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 30, Johann Hamel signals a Strasbourg throw-in in Marseille's half.
Strasbourg's Habib Diallo breaks free at Stade de la Meinau. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Johann Hamel awards Marseille a goal kick.
In the minute 32, Can Marseille get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Strasbourg's half?
Can Strasbourg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Marseille's half?
Free kick for Strasbourg in their own half.
In the minute 36, Strasbourg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Strasbourg in the half of Marseille.
Johann Hamel signals a Marseille throw-in in Strasbourg's half.
In the minute 38, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Strasbourg at Stade de la Meinau.
Strasbourg to take a throw-in in Marseille territory.
In the minute 40, Johann Hamel signals a free kick to Marseille in their own half.
Marseille have been awarded a corner by Johann Hamel.
Strasbourg have a goal kick.
In the minute 43, Free kick for Marseille in the half of Strasbourg.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Strasbourg awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Strasbourg in their own half.
In Strasbourg a free kick has been awarded the away team.
The first-half is over at Stade de la Meinau.
In the minute 46, The second-half has just kicked-off.
Morgan Sanson is replacing Pape Alassane Gueye for Marseille at Stade de la Meinau.
Throw-in Strasbourg.
In the minute 47, Johann Hamel signals a Strasbourg throw-in in Marseille's half.
Can Strasbourg capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Marseille's half?
Johann Hamel signals a throw-in for Strasbourg, close to Marseille's area.
In the minute 49, Johann Hamel signals a free kick to Marseille in their own half.
Johann Hamel signals a free kick to Strasbourg.
Strasbourg to take a throw-in in Marseille territory.
In the minute 52, Free kick Strasbourg.
Jordan Amavi (Marseille) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Can Strasbourg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Marseille's half?
In the minute 54, Throw-in for Marseille at Stade de la Meinau.
Strasbourg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Attention is being given to Marseille’s Boubacar Kamara and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 58, Anthony Caci (Strasbourg) fires in a shot – and hits the post!
Ball goes out of play for a Marseille goal kick.
In the minute 58, Marseille’s Boubacar Kamara is on his feet again at Stade de la Meinau.
Boubacar Kamara is booked for the away team.
Throw-in for Strasbourg in the half of Marseille.
Adrien Thomasson of Strasbourg smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 63, Corner awarded to Marseille.
Free kick for Marseille in their own half.
Marseille to take a throw-in in Strasbourg territory.
In the minute 65, The away team have replaced Florian Thauvin with Dario Benedetto. This is the second substitution made today by Andre Villas-Boas.
Andre Villas-Boas is making the team's third substitution at Stade de la Meinau with Dimitri Payet replacing Mickael Cuisance.
Throw-in for Marseille close to the penalty box.
In the minute 67, Johann Hamel awards the home team a throw-in.
Strasbourg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Strasbourg's Habib Diallo gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 69, Johann Hamel awards Marseille a goal kick.
Can Marseille get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Strasbourg's half?
Goal! Marseille have got their heads in front thanks to a Morgan Sanson strike.
In the minute 72, Great play from Dimitri Payet to set up the goal.
In Strasbourg a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Johann Hamel signals a free kick to Strasbourg in their own half.
In the minute 75, Free kick for Marseille in their own half.
Thierry Laurey (Strasbourg) is making a first substitution, with Mehdi Chahiri replacing Dimitri Lienard.
Free kick for Strasbourg in the half of Marseille.
In the minute 77, The away team replace Morgan Sanson with Kevin Strootman.
Ball safe as Strasbourg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Strasbourg.
In the minute 79, Johann Hamel signals a Marseille throw-in in Strasbourg's half.
Throw-in for Strasbourg in their own half.
Throw-in for Strasbourg in the half of Marseille.
In the minute 81, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Saif-Eddine Khaoui is on a sub for Valere Germain for Marseille.
In the minute 82, Throw-in for Marseille at Stade de la Meinau.
Majeed Waris is replacing Adrien Thomasson for Strasbourg at Stade de la Meinau.
Throw-in for Strasbourg in the half of Marseille.
In the minute 85, Goal kick for Marseille at Stade de la Meinau.
Throw-in Strasbourg.
Strasbourg awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 87, At Stade de la Meinau, Saif-Eddine Khaoui has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Free kick for Marseille in their own half.
Steve Mandanda for Marseille has been booked by Johann Hamel and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 89, Strasbourg make their third substitution with Lucien Kevin Zohi replacing Anthony Caci.
Johann Hamel signals a Strasbourg throw-in in Marseille's half.
In Strasbourg Strasbourg attack through Mehdi Chahiri. The finish is off target, however.
Marseille have a goal kick.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Strasbourg.
Ball goes out of play for a Marseille goal kick.
Can Strasbourg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Marseille's half?
Full-time! The final score is 0-1.
